joy-customquery: SELECT DISTINCT DIM_METRIC.MET_NAME FROM DIM_METRIC LEFT OUTER JOIN REL_TERM_METRIC ON DIM_METRIC.MET_NAME = REL_TERM_METRIC.MET_NAME WHERE REL_TERM_METRIC.MET_NAME IS NULL ORDER BY DIM_METRIC.MET_NAME

SELECT rel_term_metric.trm_name,rel_term_metric.dqx_name,src_dqaxis.dqx_code FROM rel_term_metric LEFT JOIN src_dqaxis ON src_dqaxis.dqx_label = rel_term_metric.dqx_name WHERE rel_term_metric.met_name IS NULL ORDER BY rel_term_metric.trm_name
SELECT DISTINCT rel_term_metric.trm_cluster_id,rel_term_metric.trm_name,dim_term.trm_pk FROM rel_term_metric LEFT JOIN dim_term ON rel_term_metric.trm_name = dim_term.trm_name
SELECT DISTINCT rel_term_metric.trm_cluster_id, rel_term_metric.trm_name, dim_term.trm_pk FROM rel_term_metric, dim_term WHERE rel_term_metric.trm_name = dim_term.trm_name
select SRC_DQAXIS.DQX_PK from DIM_DQAXIS, SRC_DQAXIS where DIM_DQAXIS.DQX_CODE = SRC_DQAXIS.DQX_CODE
select TRT_PK, TRT_NAME from DIM_TERM_TYPE
select TRM_PK, TRM_PHASE, TRM_NAME, TRM_DESCRIPTION, TRT_FK from DIM_TERM
select distinct TRM_NAME from FACT_GOVERNANCE, DIM_TERM Where FACT_GOVERNANCE.TRM_FK = DIM_TERM.TRM_PK
select distinct MET_NAME from REL_TERM_METRIC

SELECT DIM_DQAXIS.DQX_NAME, ROUND(avg(FRS_KPI_SCORE), 2) SCORE FROM (select * from FACT_GOVERNANCE, (select distinct FIRST_VALUE(frs_pk) OVER(PARTITION BY TRM_FK, MET_FK, DQX_FK, ORI_FK, CON_FK, DSO_FK ORDER BY JOB_FK DESC) As frs_pk from FACT_GOVERNANCE) A Where FACT_GOVERNANCE.frs_pk = A.FRS_PK and FACT_GOVERNANCE.TRM_FK > 0) X, DIM_DQAXIS WHERE X.DQX_FK = DIM_DQAXIS.DQX_PK group by DIM_DQAXIS.DQX_NAME

SELECT DIM_GLOSSARY.GLO_NAME ,'Scores' JOBS, ROUND(avg(FRS_KPI_SCORE), 2) SCORE FROM (select * from FACT_GOVERNANCE, (select distinct FIRST_VALUE(frs_pk) OVER(PARTITION BY TRM_FK, MET_FK, DQX_FK, ORI_FK, CON_FK, DSO_FK ORDER BY JOB_FK DESC) As frs_pk from FACT_GOVERNANCE) A Where FACT_GOVERNANCE.frs_pk = A.FRS_PK and FACT_GOVERNANCE.TRM_FK > 0) X, DIM_GLOSSARY, DIM_TERM WHERE X.TRM_FK = DIM_TERM.TRM_PK And DIM_GLOSSARY.GLO_PK = DIM_TERM.GLO_FK group by DIM_GLOSSARY.GLO_NAME
select distinct TERM_TYPE, JOYSTATUS from LND_TERM
select distinct REL_NAME, REL_DESCRIPTION, JOYSTATUS from LND_TERM_RELATIONSHIPS
select distinct REL_KEY_TERM_SOURCE,REL_KEY_TERM_TARGET,REL_NAME, JOYSTATUS from LND_TERM_RELATIONSHIPS
select distinct glossary_description, glossary_name, JOYLOADDATE, JOYSTATUS, JOYFUNCKEY from LND_GLOSSARY
select distinct JOYFUNCKEY, JOYLOADDATE, JOYSTATUS, SCO_NAME, SCO_DESCRIPTION, SCO_LASTRUN from LND_SCORECARD
select distinct JOYFUNCKEY, JOYLOADDATE, JOYSTATUS, category_name, category_description, category_fullpath, category_parent_key from LND_CATEGORY

select distinct JOYFUNCKEY, JOYLOADDATE, JOYSTATUS, TERM_STATUS, TERM_TYPE, term_name, term_funckey, term_description, term_usage, term_example, term_phase, term_owner, term_steward, term_owner_email, term_steward_email, glossary_key, category_key from LND_TERM
select distinct SCGROUP_NAME, JOYFUNCKEY, SCORECARD_KEY, JOYSTATUS from LND_SCORECARD_GROUP
select distinct MET_CONNECTION, MET_SOURCENAME, JOYSTATUS from LND_METRIC
select distinct ORI_NAME, JOYSTATUS from LND_METRIC

select distinct LND_METRIC.MET_NAME, LND_METRIC.MET_DESCRIPTION, JOYSTATUS, MET_WEIGHT, scorecard_key || '|' || scorecardgrp_key || '|' || LND_METRIC.met_name AS JOYFUNCKEY, MET_TYPE, SCORECARDGRP_KEY from lnd_metric order by met_name
SELECT DISTINCT TERM_NAME FROM LND_TERM WHERE TERM_NAME NOT IN (SELECT distinct rel_term_metric.trm_name FROM rel_term_metric)

select TRM_FK, DIM_TERM.TRM_NAME, round(sum(FRS_KPI_SCORE*DQX_WEIGHT)/max((Select sum(DQX_WEIGHT) SC from DIM_DQAXIS)), 2) AS GLOBALSCORE from ( select * from FACT_GOVERNANCE, ( select distinct FIRST_VALUE(frs_pk) OVER(PARTITION BY TRM_FK, MET_FK, DQX_FK, ORI_FK, CON_FK, DSO_FK ORDER BY JOB_FK DESC) As frs_pk from FACT_GOVERNANCE) A Where FACT_GOVERNANCE.frs_pk = A.FRS_PK and FACT_GOVERNANCE.TRM_FK > 0) X, DIM_DQAXIS, DIM_TERM where X.DQX_FK = DIM_DQAXIS.DQX_PK And X.TRM_FK = DIM_TERM.TRM_PK And X.TRM_FK > 0 group by TRM_FK, DIM_TERM.TRM_NAME order by GLOBALSCORE DESC
select GLO_FUNCKEY, GLO_NAME from DIM_GLOSSARY UNION select JOYFUNCKEY, GLOSSARY_NAME from LND_GLOSSARY
select CAT_FUNCKEY, CAT_NAME from DIM_CATEGORY UNION select JOYFUNCKEY, CATEGORY_NAME from LND_CATEGORY

select max(DIM_TIME.TIM_CALENDAR_DATE) AS rundate, DIM_DQAXIS.DQX_NAME, DIM_DQAXIS.DQX_WEIGHT, avg(FRS_KPI_SCORE) AS SCORE, TRM_FK from FACT_GOVERNANCE, (select distinct FIRST_VALUE(frs_pk) OVER(PARTITION BY TRM_FK, MET_FK, DQX_FK, ORI_FK, CON_FK, DSO_FK ORDER BY JOB_FK DESC) As frs_pk from FACT_GOVERNANCE) A, DIM_DQAXIS, DIM_TIME Where FACT_GOVERNANCE.frs_pk = A.FRS_PK And FACT_GOVERNANCE.DQX_FK = DIM_DQAXIS.DQX_PK And FACT_GOVERNANCE.TIM_FK = DIM_TIME.TIM_PK GROUP BY dqx_name, DIM_DQAXIS.DQX_WEIGHT, tim_calendar_date, trm_fk ORDER BY trm_fk, tim_calendar_date

select DISTINCT dim_context.con_description, dim_context.con_pk, TRM_FK from FACT_GOVERNANCE, (select distinct FIRST_VALUE(frs_pk) OVER(PARTITION BY TRM_FK, MET_FK, DQX_FK, ORI_FK, CON_FK, DSO_FK ORDER BY JOB_FK DESC) As frs_pk from FACT_GOVERNANCE) A, DIM_CONTEXT Where FACT_GOVERNANCE.frs_pk = A.FRS_PK And FACT_GOVERNANCE.con_fk = DIM_CONTEXT.con_Pk

select DISTINCT DIM_DATASOURCE.dso_sourcename, DIM_DATASOURCE.dso_connection,DIM_DATASOURCE.dso_pk, TRM_FK from FACT_GOVERNANCE, (select distinct FIRST_VALUE(frs_pk) OVER(PARTITION BY TRM_FK, MET_FK, DQX_FK, ORI_FK, CON_FK, DSO_FK ORDER BY JOB_FK DESC) As frs_pk from FACT_GOVERNANCE) A, DIM_DATASOURCE Where FACT_GOVERNANCE.frs_pk = A.FRS_PK And FACT_GOVERNANCE.dso_fk = DIM_DATASOURCE.dso_pk
select distinct TRM_PK, TRM_NAME from FACT_GOVERNANCE, DIM_TERM Where TRM_FK >0 And FACT_GOVERNANCE.TRM_FK = DIM_TERM.TRM_PK Order by TRM_NAME

SELECT DISTINCT rel_term_metric.trm_cluster_id, dim_term.trm_pk, dim_term.trm_name, dim_term.trm_description, dim_glossary.glo_name, DIM_CATEGORY.CAT_NAME, dim_term.trm_usage, dim_term.trm_example, dim_term.trm_phase, dim_term.trm_owner, dim_term.trm_steward, dim_term.trm_owner_email, dim_term.trm_steward_email, dim_glossary.glo_pk, DIM_CATEGORY.cat_pk, dim_term.object_id, dim_term_type.trt_name FROM dim_term LEFT JOIN rel_term_metric ON rel_term_metric.trm_name = dim_term.trm_name LEFT JOIN dim_term_type ON dim_term_type.trt_pk = dim_term.trt_fk LEFT JOIN DIM_CATEGORY ON dim_term.cat_fk = DIM_CATEGORY.cat_pk LEFT JOIN dim_glossary ON dim_term.glo_fk = dim_glossary.glo_pk
